text:
[Verse]
Saw you at the market stand
Bananas in your hand
You looked at me and smiled
Heart raced just like a child

[Verse 2]
Tomatoes ripe and red
Caught you looking instead
You laughed and took my hand
Made our own little band

[Chorus]
Love in the market
Can you believe
Love in the market
It's like a dream

[Verse 3]
Shopping cart romance
A little grocery dance
Veggies in the mix
Hearts in a fix

[Verse 4]
By the bread aisle we
Found harmony
Milk and honey too
Me and you

[Chorus]
Love in the market
Can you believe
Love in the market
It's like a dream
title: Love in the Market
